tooltip.pride.pride_flag: Created in 1978 by activist Gilbert Baker, flown for the first time in June 25, 1978 during San Francisco's Gay Freedom Day parade.
tooltip.pride.progress_pride_flag: The Progress Pride Flag was created in 2018 by non-binary American artist & designer Daniel Quasar, it was created to celebrate the diversity of the LGBTQ community.
tooltip.pride.gay_flag: Created in October 9, 2018 published online on VK- a Russian website, the design emerged after the rainbow flag.
tooltip.pride.lesbian_flag: The Lesbian flag (commonly known as the Sunset Lesbian Flag) was created in 2018 by Emily Gwen, it was created as a response to earlier lesbian pride flags that were perceived as exclusionary, particularly the 2010 Lipstick Lesbian Flag
tooltip.pride.bisexual_flag: Created in 1998 by Michael Page aka 'BiMagical', it was officially unveiled on December 5th, 1998
